all.quote: “Chris was able to look at the problem space and come up with a paradigm of what the high level flow should be”

all.quote: “Chris’ commitment to the Figma design deliverables, project timeline, and satisfaction of end users was top notch”

all.quote: “We were particularly impressed with both his efficiency and thoroughness”

all.quote: “I felt comfortable Chris understood the issue then giving him the chance to diagnose it pretty much confirmed it.”
